attributes.action: Change the Supermarket meal deals to a singular Pound (£)
attributes.additional_details: This change would significantly improve the poverty and hunger situation in the UK and battle the cost of living, instead of funding other ways of stopping homelessness. In stores such as Co-op and Tesco.
attributes.background: Change the price of meal deals to just a pound, instead of funding other ways of stopping homelessness, or poverty among the young or students..

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the cost of meal deals are a matter for individual supermarkets, not the UK Government or Parliament.
